main event: A bright whitish round object was observed in Guam on May 10, 1963.
interesting points: The object was the size of a pinhead, The course of the object was observed at 120° ± 5°, The sighting lasted approximately 10 seconds, The speed of the object was estimated at 2-3 miles in 10 minutes, The conclusion noted was possible meteoric material, though the duration was atypical for such material.
